results.title: Amorphous calcium magnesium phosphate nanocomposites with superior osteogenic activity for bone regeneration
results.text_hl: Herein, the combination of ACMP and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ up-regulated the regeneration of @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@calvaria defect@@@.

results.title: Sub-gingival delivery of simvastatin and rosuvastatin for treatment of chronic periodontitis with diabetes mellitus: A randomized controlled clinical-radiographic pilot study
results.text_hl: The current study intended to assess and compare the efficacy of sub-gingivally delivered @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ gel and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@RSV@@@ gel as an adjunctive medication to scaling and root planing (SRP) in the management of @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@intrabony defects@@@ in @DISEASE_Chronic_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D055113 @@@CP@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 DM@@@.

results.title: Comparative evaluation of efficacy of subgingivally delivered 1.2% Atorvastatin and 1.2% Simvastatin in the treatment of intrabony defects in chronic periodontitis: a randomized controlled trial
results.journal: J Dent Res Dent Clin Dent Prospects
results.text_hl: Morris et al showed effective @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@IBD@@@ fill and a greater decrease in PD and RAL gain compared to the control group when injectable @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ was used in three-walled periodontal IBDs, class II furcations defects and edentulous alveolar ridges in @SPECIES_9615 @@@beagle dogs@@@.

PMID: 28413591

results.title: Simvastatin local drug delivery in smokers with chronic periodontitis: a randomized controlled clinical trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: There was a greater decrease in mSBI and PD and more CAL gain with significant @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@IBD@@@ fill at sites treated with SRP plus locally delivered @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ in smokers with @DISEASE_Chronic_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D055113 @@@chronic periodontitis@@@.

results.title: Clinical effect of subgingivally delivered simvastatin in the treatment of patients with chronic periodontitis: a randomized clinical trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: There was a greater decrease in gingival index and PD and more CAL gain with significant @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@IBD@@@ fill at sites treated with SRP plus locally delivered @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Chronic_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D055113 @@@chronic periodontitis@@@.

results.title: Efficacy of subgingivally delivered simvastatin in the treatment of patients with type 2 diabetes and chronic periodontitis: a randomized double-masked controlled clinical trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: There was a greater decrease in mSBI and PD and more CAL gain with significant @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@IBD@@@ fill at sites treated with SRP plus locally delivered @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Chronic_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D055113 @@@CP@@@.
